about_the_game:
“Godstone Tactics” is a turn-based tactical strategy game set in the enchanting world of Sangreal. Lead your unique team of animal units across dynamic battlefields to outsmart your opponents. Protect your King, eliminate the enemy’s, and prove your strategic prowess in an arena where every decision matters. Do you have the cunning to claim victory and seize the throne in Sangreal?

As Sangreal descends into chaos, Savroth seeks a worthy ruler. Countless battles erupt with a single goal: to crown the true King. Perhaps that King is you!

  • Different GameboardsEach gameboard features varied terrains and challenges, including treacherous ice fields and petrifying fireflies. Adapt your strategies to dominate every board.

  • Setting Your TeamStrategically place your animal units on your side. Each unit has distinct roles and movement patterns, making placement essential for victory.

  • Strategic Depth and Competitive PlayEngage in tactical battles where every move is pivotal. Protect your King, eliminate your opponent’s, and compete in ranked matches to climb the leaderboards.

• Immersive Pixel Art: Enjoy vibrant pixel art that brings Sangreal’s world to life.

• Different Play Modes: Play casual matches, ranked battles, or practice against AI.

• Daily Puzzles: Solve daily challenges to earn rewards and enhance your tactics.

• Different Environments: Battle on varied terrains, each with unique gameplay effects.

• Set Your Team: Choose your animal units from a common pool each game, focusing on strategic placement.

• Discover Sangreal: Explore the rich lore and stories behind each unit and battlefield.

• Competitive Play Coming Soon: Compete in ranked matches to earn royal points and rise in the leaderboards.

• Cross-Platform Coming Soon: Play “Godstone Tactics” on PC (Steam) and mobile devices (Android, iOS).

Beyond the tactical arenas, Sangreal offers a wealth of adventures, locales, and heroes waiting to be discovered. As developers, we are excited to share our first indie game, "Godstone Tactics," and can't wait to hear your thoughts and experiences in this immersive world.

short_description: Godstone Tactics is a tactical turn-based strategy game set in the mystical world of Sangreal. Position unique animal heroes with special move-sets on isometric arenas. Adapt your tactics to dynamic board effects, protect your King, and outmaneuver opponents to claim victory in competitive battles!
